root.name: Antique Road Trip USA
root.description: Antique Road Trip USA tells a story of a young married couple, James and Grace Anderson, with a passion for collecting old, valuable stuff. They go around the USA collecting antiques they place in their own store and helping out friends who want to sell their own collections.Antique Road Trip USA is a hidden object game with an assorted mix of mini-games, perfect for those who want to play games for light, quick fun.System RequirementsPCOS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8CPU: 1.0 GHzRAM: 256 MBDirectX: 9.0Hard Drive: 150 MBMacOS: 10.4CPU: 800 MhzRAM: 256 MBHard Drive: 153 MB
